metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19797 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
read_colordef in read.c in Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7b has an out-of-bounds write.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
transfig - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> can't reproduce on xenial and bionic. Could reproduce on eoan.

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1').
